channel.title: CVE Feed for MongoDB Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for MongoDB Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2019-20923|2024-08-05T03:00:19.094Z -- mongodb%20inc. -- mongodb%20server
item.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of service by issuing specially crafted queries, which throw unhandled Javascript exceptions containing types intended to be scoped to the Javascript engine's internals. This issue affects MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.7.

item.title: CVE-2019-20924|2024-08-05T03:00:17.401Z -- mongodb%20inc. -- mongodb%20server
item.description: A user authorized to perform database queries may trigger denial of service by issuing specially crafted queries which trigger an invariant in the IndexBoundsBuilder. This issue affects MongoDB Server v4.2 versions prior to 4.2.2.

item.title: CVE-2019-20925|2024-08-05T03:00:17.403Z -- mongodb%20inc. -- mongodb%20server
item.description: An unauthenticated client can trigger denial of service by issuing specially crafted wire protocol messages, which cause the message decompressor to incorrectly allocate memory. This issue affects MongoDB Server v4.2 versions prior to 4.2.1; MongoDB Server v4.0 versions prior to 4.0.13; MongoDB Server v3.6 versions prior to 3.6.15 and MongoDB Server v3.4 versions prior to 3.4.24.
